attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I did not expect my petition to succeeed, after all who is going to voluntarily agree to take his snout out of the trough? I must have had a moment's madness, no wonder people don't like politicians or politics.   I call upon the P.M to scrap all MPs allowances and pay them the proper going rate for their job. Their salary should be linked to any other civil servant of the same grade.
Blue collar workers do not get travel  and/or housing allowances yet they still have to travel to their place of employment and homes.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
